section.description: The SQL::DataTypeInfo.NamedFormatExpression property is a CR-LF delimited list of expressions in the following format:

section.example: Name1 = Xbasic_Expression_1 [ CR-LF Name2 = Xbasic_Expression_2 ] ... [ CR-LF NameN = Xbasic_Expression_N ]

section.description: The Xbasic_Expression is used to format the data when the named format is requested. The expression executes in a context that has the following predefined variables:
This creates a single default format.
This creates a list of two named formats.
